title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXV, subch. B, pt. 2173 - Corrective And Remedial Actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXV, subch. B, pt. 2173 - Corrective And Remedial Actions

State Regulations
§ 2173.1 - Corrective or remedial actions
§ 2173.2 - Curing performance deficiencies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXV, subch. B, pt. 2173

Statutory authority: Private Housing Finance Law, §
1113[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
